meta.Title: TIPS FROM THE TELETYPE [New York Times, Sunday, March 20, 1949]
meta.Author: Alberta N. Burton

across.question: Dutch East Indies island seeking independence.
Cavalry brigade of English household troops.
Southern half of this country is now a republic.
"___ Me, Kate," new Cole Porter musical.
Mr. Churchill declined the honor of becoming one.
Proper way to address the Queen of England.
Her great-great-great-grandson arrived recently in England.
These fed Elijah in the desert.

down.question: French psychologist, deviser of first successful I. Q. test.
Fine for murder, early Scots law.
Backbone of large U. S. agricultural industry.
One theme of the Sermon on the Mount.
Lieut. Gail ___; his "Operation Little Vittles" has parachuted 90,000 candy bars to Berlin children.
They have the power of filibuster.
